name: Gris Commits Insurance Fraud: The Game
name_original: Gris Commits Insurance Fraud: The Game
description:
This is a fan art game made in the course of 5 days. It is inspired in the work of Vertigris and his original character Gris. 

  • Endless "runner" where you have to fall down an infinite escalator for as long as you can
  • Collect your merch and earn money
  • Spend your money in cosmetics and upgrades
  • Enjoy the silliness and Photo Mode to take some screenshots
    • Feel free to tag me @amarilloarts_ on twitter of you post any media of this game
  • You can run this game on any system from the web
    • Windows PC
    • Mac OSX
    • Android
    • iPhone
Warning

Any future updates will wipe your progress. I haven't found a way to not have this happen. Due to this, I won't update the game for a good while. Sorry about that.

Controls
  • Left click / spacebar / touch anywhere to jump
  • Photo mode
    • Left click / one finger swipe to orbit around
    • Right click / two fingers swipe to adjust light angle
    • Touch the game logo on the top right to exit Photo mode
Credits
  • Vertigris for creating Gris and making the original artwork that inspired this game
  • Noyemi K for donating the songs that make up the sound
    • CyberWorld2 (Menu music)
    • Mindstorm (Game music)
  • Amarillo for developing the game and making the graphics
